thread.title: Gah! Watch the Epic Full Trailer for Star Wars: The Force Awakens
thread.title_full: Gah! Watch the Epic Full Trailer for Star Wars: The Force Awakens

author: Shelli Weinstein, TV GUIDE
title: Gah! Watch the Epic Full Trailer for Star Wars: The Force Awakens
text:
John Boyega and Daisy Ridley, Star Wars: The Force Awakens John Boyega and Daisy Ridley, Star Wars: The Force Awakens Gah! Watch the Epic Full Trailer for Star Wars: The Force Awakens 1 / 1 Back to Gallery 
The full trailer for Star Wars: The Force Awakens is finally here, and shows off all of the battle and adventure hitting theaters on Dec. 18. 
Take a look at the new footage, which previews Daisy Ridley , John Boyega and Oscar Issac 's role in the war against the dark side, and of course, Kylo Ren's ( Adam Driver ) dedication to continuing what Darth Vader started. And oh yeah, don't miss Luke, Han and Leia's appearances. 
The trailer dropped during ESPN's Monday Night Football and was timed to the launch of ticket sales that strained or crashed many sites including Fandango and MovieTickets.com. 
Do you have your tickets yet? Star Wars: The Force Awakens hits theaters on Friday, Dec. 18.
